Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Bastet as a lioness-headed figure clasping a sistrum and seated upon a throne with open-work representations of Neheb-kau on the sides; suspension ring at the back of the head.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.34
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Dr Joseph John Acworth
